classes.title: Intelligent Visual Computing
description: Leveraged neural networks and other machine learning algorithms to solve problems related to images and 3D models.

Some problems included image classification using Convolutional Neural Networks, surface denoising using Conditional Random Fields, and mapping voice recordings to facial animations via Long Short-Term Memory RNN
Language: MATLAB

classes.title: Practice & Application of Data Management
description: Studied the use of PostgreSQL Database Management System to manipulate and manage large data sets, and learning the challenges and solution that arise thereof.
Topics included Views, SQL Injection and how to prevent it, Boyce-Codd Normal Form, Hadoop and MapReduce, Parallelization, ER Modelling, and Database Tuning.
Languages: SQL, Java, Pig

classes.title: Computational Linguistics: Use & Meaning
description: Covered advanced methods in analyzing text and processing natural language with the use the Natural Language Toolkit.
Investigated different applications of Supervised Learning for linguistic analysis.
Language: Python

classes.title: Language Acquisition
description: Investigated linguistic theory and how it can explain the paths of acquisition which children take in learning their first language.
Conducted rigorous social experiments to capture linguistic knowledge of particpants to draw conclusions about innate linguistic abilities.
Explored what language acquisition reveals about the human mind, and the uniqueness and innateness of human language and cognition.

classes.title: Machine Learning
description: Introduced to a wide variety of state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms and their respective implementations
Problem solving using the sklearn library in Python, competing amongst classmates via Kaggle for optimal solutions to homework problems
Focused both on practical usage of machine learning algorithms and the underlying theory and mathematical proofs behind them.
Language: Python

classes.title: Intro to Human-Computer Interaction
description: Introduced to principles of design within and outside the realm of UX development
Implemented front-end design for novel iOS app for final project
Discussed and practiced full UX design cycle including user interviews, testing, paper mockups and other low-fidelity protoyping methods.
Language: Swift

classes.title: Natural Language Processing
description: Investigated state-of-the-art natural language processing algorithms and problem-solving methods from an analytical perspective
Implemented several powerful NLP algorithms for tasks such as sentiment analysis, POS tagging, and word sense disambiguation (among others)
For final project, worked in group of 3 to develop novel supervised learning method for generating song lyrics based on genre.
Language: Python

classes.title: Intro to Computational Linguistics
description: Introductory NLP class from a Linguistics perspective
Exploration of different manners of problem-solving within the NLTK library
Language: Python

classes.title: Web Programming
description: Team-based learning class covering methods of developing modern, secure websites
Introduction to Bootstrap, React, and MongoDB
For class project, worked in team of 4 to develop React website: novel text editor for songwriters that suggests rhyming words, synonyms, etc.
Languages: HTML, CSS, JSX, ES6

classes.title: Introduction to Problem Solving with Computers
